info.description: This is the API for the Continuous Compliance Framework.
info.title: Continuous Compliance Framework API

post.description: Creates an assessment result in the specified stream and label mapping
Returns the compliance over time records for a particular search query
post.summary: Get Compliance Over Time for Search query

post.description: Returns the compliance over time records for a particular streamId
post.summary: Get Compliance Over Time for stream

get.description: Fetches the latest result for each stream associated in an assessment plan
get.summary: Fetch all assessment results for an assessment plan

post.description: Returns a list of the latest result for each stream matching the specified label selector
post.summary: Search assessment results using label selectors

get.summary: Fetch all assessment results for a result stream

scopes.description: Scopes can be either `Condition` or nested `Query`.
